#
# Source files: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE: edit CMakeListsLocal.txt instead.
#
#

SET (LOCAL_LIBRARY_BASENAME vtkFSLReader)

INCLUDE (${VTKFSLREADER_SOURCE_DIR}/cxx/CMakeListsLocal.txt)

# --------------------------------------------------------------------------
# You probably do not need to modify anything below this line

#
# Create the vtkFSLReader C++ library
#
# (Doesn't work here because of a CMake bug)
# ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFSLReader ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

#
# Create the vtkFSLReader Tcl library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_TCL)

  VTK_WRAP_TCL (vtkFSLReaderTCL FSLReaderTCL_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFSLReaderTCL ${FSLReaderTCL_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderTCL 
                         vtkFSLReader
                         vtkIOTCL 
                         vtkGraphicsTCL 
                         vtkImagingTCL 
                         vtkFilteringTCL 
                         vtkCommonTCL
                         ${TCL_LIBRARY})
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderTCL vtkHybridTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderTCL vtkParallelTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderTCL vtkPatentedTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderTCL vtkRenderingTCL)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_TCL AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_TCL)

#
# Create the vtkFSLReader Python library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_PYTHON)

  VTK_WRAP_PYTHON (vtkFSLReaderPython FSLReaderPython_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})

  IF (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFSLReaderPython MODULE ${FSLReaderPython_SRCS})
  ELSE (APPLE)
    ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFSLReaderPython SHARED ${FSLReaderPython_SRCS})
  ENDIF (APPLE)

  IF (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython 
                           vtkFSLReader
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           debug ${PYTHON_DEBUG_LIBRARY} 
                           optimized ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ELSE (WIN32)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython 
                           vtkFSLReaderPython 
                           vtkIOPython
                           vtkGraphicsPython
                           vtkImagingPython
                           vtkFilteringPython
                           vtkCommonPython
                           ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
  ENDIF (WIN32)

  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython vtkHybridPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython vtkParallelPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython vtkPatentedPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderPython vtkRenderingPython)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_PYTHON AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_PYTHON)

#
# Create the vtkFSLReader Java library
#

IF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_JAVA)

  VTK_WRAP_JAVA (vtkFSLReaderJava FSLReaderJava_SRCS ${LOCAL_MODULE_SRCS})
  ADD_LIBRARY (vtkFSLReaderJava SHARED ${FSLReaderJava_SRCS})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderJava 
                         vtkFSLReader
                         vtkIOJava
                         vtkGraphicsJava
                         vtkImagingJava 
                         vtkFilteringJava
                         vtkCommonJava)
  IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderJava vtkHybridJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

  IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderJava vtkParallelJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

  IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderJava vtkPatentedJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

  IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReaderJava vtkRenderingJava)
  ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)

ENDIF (VTK_WRAP_JAVA AND VTKFSLREADER_WRAP_JAVA)

#
# Link to VTK and local
#

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (
  vtkFSLReader
  vtkIO
  vtkGraphics
  vtkImaging 
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
)

IF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReader vtkHybrid)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_HYBRID)

IF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReader vtkParallel)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PARALLEL)

IF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReader vtkPatented)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_PATENTED)

IF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES (vtkFSLReader vtkRendering)
ENDIF (VTK_USE_RENDERING)
